leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 闭环科研-主动学习/贝叶斯优化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 设计→执行→更新→再设计→评测

tools.name: 5G-ERA Middleware
tools.one_line_profile: Middleware for orchestration and lifecycle management of cloud-native robotic applications
tools.detailed_description: A middleware solution developed as part of the 5G-ERA project to facilitate the orchestration, lifecycle management, and integration of cloud-native robotic applications, enabling seamless communication between robots and cloud services.

tools.name: ARES OS
tools.one_line_profile: Research software for closed-loop autonomous experimentation systems
tools.detailed_description: ARES OS is a software framework designed by AFRL to streamline the creation and management of systems for closed-loop, autonomous experimentation, facilitating the integration of hardware and AI algorithms for scientific discovery.

tools.name: CL-DiffPhyCon
tools.one_line_profile: Closed-loop diffusion control for physical systems
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a closed-loop diffusion control method for physical systems, achieving significant speedup in sampling efficiency for scientific control tasks.

tools.name: Nokia Bell Labs-MIT ROS Mapping Platform
tools.one_line_profile: Middleware for mapping ROS sensor data to non-ROS robotic systems
tools.detailed_description: A middleware platform developed in collaboration between MIT Manipal and Nokia Bell Labs to enable the mapping and integration of ROS sensor data with non-ROS sensor data in robotic systems.

tools.name: nmea
tools.one_line_profile: Rust parser for NMEA 0183 marine electronics protocol
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library for parsing NMEA 0183 messages, commonly used for communication between marine electronics and sensors like GNSS receivers, sonars, and anemometers in field robotics and data collection.

tools.name: pyLabLib
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for device control and experiment automation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for controlling various laboratory devices and automating experiments, providing a unified interface for hardware interaction.

tools.name: Autodesk Machine Control Framework
tools.one_line_profile: Middleware for integrating CAD/CAM with machine hardware
tools.detailed_description: A middleware framework designed to integrate CAD/CAM software with machine hardware systems, enabling the creation of production-ready, cohesive closed-loop manufacturing and control systems.

tools.name: AtvK4200Lpt
tools.one_line_profile: Python control module for Keithley 4200 SCS
tools.detailed_description: A Python module providing an interface to control the Keithley 4200 Semiconductor Characterization System (SCS) instrument functions, enabling automated electrical testing and measurement.

tools.name: Instruments.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Instrument control library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for controlling laboratory instruments, facilitating data acquisition and experiment automation in scientific research.

tools.name: PyQLab
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for instrument control and quantum experiments
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by BBN-Q for instrument control and conducting superconducting quantum information processing (QIP) experiments.

tools.name: LabOP
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory Open Protocol Language
tools.detailed_description: A standardized language and framework for describing laboratory protocols, enabling the exchange and execution of experimental procedures across different lab automation platforms.

tools.name: LabOP Editor
tools.one_line_profile: Editor for Laboratory Open Protocol (LabOP)
tools.detailed_description: A visual editor tool for creating and modifying Laboratory Open Protocol (LabOP) descriptions, facilitating the design of automated laboratory experiments.

tools.name: aiida-gromacs
tools.one_line_profile: GROMACS plugin for AiiDA workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that interfaces GROMACS molecular dynamics software with the AiiDA workflow management system, enabling automated and reproducible biomolecular simulations.

tools.name: WeightWatcher
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostic tool for analyzing Deep Neural Networks using statistical physics
tools.detailed_description: A tool that applies ideas from statistical mechanics (Random Matrix Theory) to analyze the weight matrices of Deep Neural Networks, providing diagnostics for model accuracy and generalization capability without needing test data.

tools.name: concore
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for closed-loop peripheral neuromodulation control
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for building closed-loop control systems for peripheral neuromodulation, facilitating real-time interaction with neural interfaces.

tools.name: LabToolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for instrument control and automation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing tools and drivers for controlling laboratory instruments and automating data collection processes.

tools.name: hyperion
tools.one_line_profile: Unattended data collection system using BlueSky/Ophyd
tools.detailed_description: A system for unattended data collection at Diamond Light Source, utilizing the BlueSky and Ophyd frameworks to automate synchrotron experiments.

tools.name: Plateo
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for planning, simulating, and reporting laboratory automation experiments
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to assist in the automation of biological laboratories. It provides functionalities for parsing plate data, generating reports, and simulating liquid handling picklists, facilitating the workflow between experimental design and robotic execution.

tools.name: gpudrive
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance multi-agent driving simulator for reinforcement learning
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-accelerated driving simulator capable of running over 1 million FPS. It is designed for multi-agent reinforcement learning research in autonomous driving, enabling rapid training and evaluation of driving policies.

tools.name: neural-processes
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Neural Processes for function approximation and uncertainty estimation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Neural Processes, a class of neural networks that combine the benefits of Gaussian Processes (uncertainty estimation) and deep learning (computational efficiency). Useful for meta-learning and modeling scientific data with uncertainty.

tools.name: adaptive_motion_control
tools.one_line_profile: ROS middleware for adaptive motion control of industrial robots
tools.detailed_description: A middleware enabling fast switching between collision-free motion planning (MoveIt), cartesian/joint jogging, and pose tracking for industrial robots. It bridges high-level planning with low-level robot drivers.

tools.name: ot2-controller
tools.one_line_profile: SiLA 2 compliant controller for Opentrons OT-2 robots
tools.detailed_description: A software controller that exposes the Opentrons OT-2 liquid handling robot capabilities via the SiLA 2 (Standardization in Lab Automation) standard, facilitating integration into automated laboratory workflows.

tools.name: sila-orchestrator
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic SiLA 2 client for coordinating laboratory services
tools.detailed_description: A client application designed to orchestrate and coordinate various laboratory devices and services that adhere to the SiLA 2 standard, enabling dynamic workflow execution in automated labs.

tools.name: gea-PRISM
tools.one_line_profile: Software framework for autonomous experimentation
tools.detailed_description: Codebase for the PRISM Autonomous Experimentation Group, likely containing algorithms and control logic for self-driving laboratories and automated experimental loops.

tools.name: LLMatDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Autonomous materials discovery framework using Large Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A framework that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to autonomously design and discover new materials. It integrates LLM reasoning with domain-specific knowledge for materials science tasks.

tools.name: NetBridgeForSwarm
tools.one_line_profile: Network communication middleware for ROS1 swarm robotics
tools.detailed_description: A middleware designed for ROS1 environments to facilitate remote transmission of services, topics, and images among swarm robots. It simplifies the construction of complex communication networks for cluster robotics research.

tools.name: Deploy-an-RL-policy-on-the-Unitree-Go2-robot
tools.one_line_profile: Sim2Real framework for deploying RL policies to Unitree Go2 robots
tools.detailed_description: A framework for low-level control of the Unitree Go2 legged robot using ROS 2. It supports validating control policies in MuJoCo simulation and deploying them to the real robot, facilitating Sim2Real research.

tools.name: ASER
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale weighted eventuality knowledge graph for commonsense reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale knowledge graph focusing on activities, states, events, and their relations. It provides data and tools for commonsense reasoning and event understanding in AI research.

tools.name: mujoco_sim
tools.one_line_profile: ROS interface for the MuJoCo physics simulator
tools.detailed_description: A ROS package that provides an interface to the MuJoCo simulator, allowing roboticists to use MuJoCo for physics-based simulation within the ROS ecosystem.

tools.name: ado
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for executing benchmarks and computational experiments at scale
tools.detailed_description: An extendible framework designed to manage and execute large-scale computational experiments and benchmarks, facilitating reproducible research and performance evaluation.

tools.name: Zelig
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical framework for estimating causal effects and modeling
tools.detailed_description: A statistical framework in R that provides a unified interface to a wide range of statistical models, simplifying the process of estimating, interpreting, and presenting results, particularly for causal inference.

tools.name: cable_robot
tools.one_line_profile: Control software for custom cable-driven robots
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing the code to control and operate a custom cable-driven robot, supporting research in robotics kinematics and control.

tools.name: Chemosensitivity
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for predicting chemosensitivity from gene expression data
tools.detailed_description: A research tool implemented in R for predicting the sensitivity of cells to chemical compounds based on gene expression profiles, useful in pharmacogenomics and cancer research.

tools.name: SoftwareDefinedRadio4JUCE
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for building Software Defined Radio applications with JUCE
tools.detailed_description: A framework that provides a hardware abstraction layer and DSP classes for creating Software Defined Radio (SDR) applications using the JUCE framework. Applicable in radio astronomy and signal processing research.

tools.name: aiida-fleur
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the FLEUR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the FLEUR code (a FLAPW DFT implementation). It enables high-throughput electronic structure calculations and automated workflows in materials science.

tools.name: aiida-kkr
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the JuKKR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the JuKKR code (KKR Green function method). It supports high-throughput density functional theory calculations for materials science.

tools.name: ClosedLoopReachability.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Reachability analysis tool for closed-loop control systems
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for performing reachability analysis on closed-loop control systems. It is used in formal verification and control theory to guarantee system safety and performance.

tools.name: icVision
tools.one_line_profile: Computer vision framework for the iCub humanoid robot
tools.detailed_description: A modular framework for performing computer vision tasks such as object recognition and localisation in 3D space, specifically designed for the iCub humanoid robot to support cognitive robotics research.

tools.name: Artificial Pancreas Platform
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source closed-loop insulin delivery system using machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A software platform designed for managing diabetes through a closed-loop system. It utilizes machine learning algorithms and continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) data to automatically adjust insulin dosing, serving as a medical cyber-physical system.

tools.name: LabScript-AI
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered generator for Opentrons laboratory protocols
tools.detailed_description: A laboratory automation tool that leverages natural language processing to generate execution protocols for Opentrons liquid handling robots, bridging the gap between human instructions and robotic execution.

tools.name: Koheron Server
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance server for scientific instrument control
tools.detailed_description: A TCP/Websocket server designed for interfacing with and controlling Koheron scientific instruments and FPGA-based hardware, facilitating real-time data acquisition and hardware management.

tools.name: Kratos Multiphysics
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for building parallel multi-disciplinary simulation software
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for developing parallel, multi-disciplinary simulation software. It focuses on modularity and high-performance computing (HPC) to solve complex physical problems involving fluid dynamics, structural mechanics, and thermal transfer.

tools.name: TacTok
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Coq proof script synthesis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automated synthesis of proof scripts in the Coq proof assistant, aiding in formal verification and mathematical logic research.

tools.name: Open Instrument Control (oic)
tools.one_line_profile: Library for controlling scientific instruments
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library designed to provide a standardized interface for controlling various scientific instruments, facilitating hardware abstraction in experimental setups.

tools.name: Swarm Intelligence Optimization Algorithms
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of swarm intelligence optimization algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing various swarm intelligence algorithms (e.g., Crow Search, Salp Swarm, Sparrow Search) for solving optimization problems, commonly used in scientific modeling and parameter estimation.

tools.name: Martian Catalyst Synthesis Code
tools.one_line_profile: Robotic control code for AI-driven synthesis of oxygen-producing catalysts
tools.detailed_description: The codebase for the 'Robotic AI-Chemist' project, enabling the automated and intelligent synthesis of oxygen-producing catalysts from Martian meteorites. It likely includes logic for robotic manipulation and chemical synthesis optimization.

tools.name: MLE-agent
tools.one_line_profile: AI agent for automating machine learning engineering and research tasks
tools.detailed_description: An intelligent agent designed to assist researchers and engineers by integrating with arXiv and Papers with Code to generate research plans, code, and perform literature reviews, facilitating the scientific research workflow.

tools.name: ArmSym
tools.one_line_profile: Simulated VR laboratory for human-robot control experiments
tools.detailed_description: A virtual reality simulation environment designed for conducting human-robot interaction and control experiments, providing a safe and controllable setting for robotics research.

tools.name: MPh
tools.one_line_profile: Pythonic scripting interface for Comsol Multiphysics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a scripting interface to Comsol Multiphysics, allowing researchers to automate simulations, manage models, and extract results programmatically.

tools.name: AutoLabeler
tools.one_line_profile: GUI tool for labeling action frames in self-driving datasets
tools.detailed_description: A graphical tool designed to facilitate the assignment and verification of action labels for individual frames in self-driving car datasets, aiding in the preparation of training data for autonomous systems.

tools.name: GPIB-pyvisa
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for controlling instruments via GPIB using PyVISA
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based utility for controlling scientific instruments via the GPIB interface using the PyVISA library, enabling automated data collection and device configuration.

tools.name: bqev23k
tools.one_line_profile: Control software for TI EV2300 battery management hardware
tools.detailed_description: A C# WPF application for controlling the Texas Instruments EV2300 hardware interface, specifically designed for managing BQ40Z80 battery pack managers. Useful for energy storage research and battery testing.

tools.name: Lab Control GUI
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for centralized laboratory device control
tools.detailed_description: A scalable graphical user interface for centralized control of laboratory devices, operating on a shared API for instrument drivers to streamline experimental workflows.

tools.name: JISA
tools.one_line_profile: Library for instrument control and experiment GUI creation
tools.detailed_description: A Java library designed for standardized instrument control, data handling, and the creation of simple GUIs for experiment control programs.

tools.name: OS-Genesis
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for automating GUI agent trajectory construction
tools.detailed_description: Code and data for automating the construction of GUI agent trajectories via reverse task synthesis. This tool supports research in autonomous agents and their interaction with digital environments.

tools.name: OSVVM AXI4
tools.one_line_profile: AXI4 verification components for hardware design
tools.detailed_description: A set of VHDL verification components for AXI4 Full, Lite, and Stream interfaces, used in the verification of digital hardware designs (FPGA/ASIC), which is critical for developing scientific instrumentation and computing hardware.

tools.name: Open Simulation Interface
tools.one_line_profile: Generic interface for environmental perception in virtual automated driving scenarios
tools.detailed_description: A generic interface for the environmental perception of automated driving functions in virtual scenarios. It serves as a connector between automated driving functions and driving simulators.

tools.name: PLACE
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for laboratory automation, control, and experimentation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for laboratory automation, control, and experimentation, facilitating the management of lab instruments and experimental workflows.

tools.name: GammaRay
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical interface for GSLib and geomodeling algorithms
tools.detailed_description: GammaRay is a graphical interface to GSLib and other geomodeling algorithms, facilitating geological modeling and analysis.

tools.name: ros_control_boilerplate
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation interface and template for ros_control hardware setup
tools.detailed_description: Provides a simple simulation interface and template for setting up a hardware interface for ros_control, facilitating robotics simulation and control integration.

tools.name: PyLabRobot
tools.one_line_profile: Hardware agnostic SDK for lab automation and liquid handling
tools.detailed_description: An interactive and hardware agnostic SDK for lab automation, specifically designed to control liquid handling robots and other lab equipment.

tools.name: Baxter Simulator
tools.one_line_profile: Gazebo Simulation interface for the Baxter Research Robot
tools.detailed_description: Provides the Gazebo Simulation interface for the Baxter Research Robot, allowing researchers to simulate robot behaviors and control algorithms.

tools.name: Sawyer Simulator
tools.one_line_profile: Gazebo Simulation interface for the Sawyer Robot
tools.detailed_description: Provides the Gazebo Simulation interface for the Sawyer Robot, enabling simulation of the robot's kinematics and dynamics for research purposes.

tools.name: RoboDK Plug-In Interface
tools.one_line_profile: Interface to extend RoboDK software for industrial robot simulation
tools.detailed_description: The RoboDK Plug-In Interface allows users to extend or customize RoboDK software for industrial robots and simulation of robot arms, facilitating custom research workflows.

tools.name: RsInstrument
tools.one_line_profile: Python remote-control communication module for Rohde & Schwarz instruments
tools.detailed_description: RsInstrument is a Python remote-control communication module for Rohde & Schwarz SCPI-based Test and Measurement Instruments, enabling automated data acquisition and instrument control.

tools.name: Catalyst.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical reaction network and systems biology interface for SciML
tools.detailed_description: Catalyst.jl is a chemical reaction network and systems biology interface for scientific machine learning (SciML). It provides high-performance, GPU-parallelized solvers for modeling chemical and biological systems.

tools.name: CAENpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library to control CAEN instruments
tools.detailed_description: Easily control CAEN instruments from Python, facilitating data acquisition and hardware control in physics experiments.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab program for solving 2D fracture problems using XFEM
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab program that solves fracture problems involving arbitrary multiple crack propagations in a 2D linear-elastic solid based on the principle of minimum potential energy using the Extended Finite Element Method (XFEM).

tools.name: LeeQ
tools.one_line_profile: Pulse sequence orchestration for quantum computing experiments
tools.detailed_description: LeeQ is a python package for orchestrating pulse sequences for quantum computing experiments with easy to use syntax, facilitating experimental control.

tools.name: Simple Device Model (sdm)
tools.one_line_profile: Open source instrument control and data acquisition framework
tools.detailed_description: An open source instrument control and data acquisition framework designed to simplify the interaction with various lab devices.

tools.name: aiida-champ
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the CHAMP quantum chemistry code
tools.detailed_description: AiiDA plugin to handle the workflow of CHAMP (Quantum Chemistry) using AiiDA, enabling automated and reproducible computational chemistry workflows.

tools.name: aiida-qp2
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Quantum Package 2.0
tools.detailed_description: AiiDA plugin for Quantum Package 2.0, facilitating the integration of Quantum Package calculations into AiiDA workflows.

tools.name: CAMD
tools.one_line_profile: Agent-based sequential learning software for materials discovery
tools.detailed_description: Computational Autonomy for Materials Discovery (CAMD) is an agent-based sequential learning software designed to automate the discovery of new materials through active learning and autonomous experimentation.

tools.name: BlueSky
tools.one_line_profile: Open source air traffic simulator for research
tools.detailed_description: The open source air traffic simulator designed for research into air traffic management and control systems.

tools.name: SEML
tools.one_line_profile: Slurm Experiment Management Library for scientific experiments
tools.detailed_description: SEML (Slurm Experiment Management Library) allows for the automatic orchestration and management of scientific experiments on Slurm clusters.

tools.name: AROC
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for Automated Controller Synthesis
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for Automated Controller Synthesis, used in the design and verification of cyber-physical systems and control logic.

tools.name: Rohde & Schwarz Python Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Python instrument control toolbox for Rohde & Schwarz test equipment
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for controlling Rohde & Schwarz instruments, facilitating laboratory automation and data acquisition from RF and microwave test equipment.

tools.name: Sisyphus
tools.one_line_profile: Automated code transformation framework for High-Level Synthesis
tools.detailed_description: A framework for automated code transformation and pragma insertion in High-Level Synthesis (HLS), leveraging nonlinear programming for optimization in EDA.

tools.name: EOS
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment Orchestration System for laboratory automation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software framework and runtime for laboratory automation, designed to orchestrate experiments and manage lab hardware.

tools.name: ns3-SUMO-Interface
tools.one_line_profile: Interface between ns-3 network simulator and SUMO traffic simulator
tools.detailed_description: A connector tool allowing co-simulation between ns-3 (network) and SUMO (urban mobility), enabling control of network modules based on mobility models.

tools.name: Automancer
tools.one_line_profile: Software for designing and automating biological experiments
tools.detailed_description: A software application that enables researchers to design, automate, and manage their experiments, specifically targeting biological lab automation.

tools.name: aiida-cusp
tools.one_line_profile: Custodian based VASP Plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with VASP using Custodian for error handling and job management in materials science simulations.

tools.name: aiida-phonopy
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Phonopy
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine to perform phonon calculations using Phonopy, enabling automated vibrational property analysis of materials.

tools.name: aiida-trains-pot
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning workflow for neural network interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA workflow that implements a fully automated active learning scheme to train neural network interatomic potentials for materials simulations.

tools.name: aiida-vasp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for VASP simulations
tools.detailed_description: The official AiiDA plugin for running and managing simulations with the Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP).

tools.name: aiidalab
tools.one_line_profile: Core platform for AiiDAlab
tools.detailed_description: Implements the core functions and environment for AiiDAlab, a web-based platform for computational materials science workflows.

tools.name: aiidalab-qe
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab App for Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.detailed_description: An application within the AiiDAlab platform that provides a graphical interface and workflows for running Quantum ESPRESSO calculations.

tools.name: aiida-ase
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for ASE
tools.detailed_description: A plugin allowing the use of Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) calculators and structures within the AiiDA provenance framework.

tools.name: aiida-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for AiiDA to interface with the LAMMPS molecular dynamics simulator, enabling automated MD workflows.

tools.name: acwf-verification-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for AiiDA common workflows verification
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts and tools to run and perform data analysis for the verification of AiiDA common workflows across different simulation codes.

tools.name: aiida-common-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Common workflow interfaces for materials-science codes
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing common workflow interfaces (protocols) across various materials science codes and AiiDA plugins to ensure reproducibility and interoperability.

tools.name: aiida-core
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Interactive Infrastructure and Database for Computational Science
tools.detailed_description: The core engine of AiiDA, a workflow manager and provenance tracking system for computational science simulations.

tools.name: aiida-cp2k
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CP2K
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for AiiDA to interface with the CP2K quantum chemistry and solid state physics software package.

tools.name: aiida-hubbard
tools.one_line_profile: Hubbard parameters calculation workflow for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A tool for calculating self-consistent onsite and intersite Hubbard parameters from first-principles using AiiDA workflows.

tools.name: aiida-hyperqueue
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for HyperQueue metascheduler
tools.detailed_description: A plugin enabling AiiDA to submit and manage jobs using the HyperQueue metascheduler, optimizing high-throughput task execution on HPC.

tools.name: aiida-project
tools.one_line_profile: Project management tool for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for managing AiiDA projects, facilitating the organization and reproducibility of computational research projects.

tools.name: aiida-quantumespresso
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.detailed_description: The official AiiDA plugin for interfacing with the Quantum ESPRESSO suite of codes for electronic-structure calculations.

tools.name: aiida-shell
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin to wrap arbitrary shell commands into the provenance graph
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for AiiDA that allows running any shell command or script as an AiiDA JobCalculation, enabling the integration of simple executables into complex scientific workflows without writing full plugins.

tools.name: aiida-submission-controller
tools.one_line_profile: Utility for managing high-throughput submission of AiiDA processes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to manage large numbers of AiiDA process submissions, providing control over the maximum number of concurrent runs to optimize resource usage in high-throughput computing.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the Wannier90 electronic structure code
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that interfaces with the Wannier90 code, enabling the calculation of maximally localized Wannier functions within the AiiDA provenance framework.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflows for Wannier90 calculations using AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A collection of advanced, automated workflows for computing Wannier functions using AiiDA and Wannier90, designed to streamline complex electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: aiida-workgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive GUI and engine for designing flexible AiiDA workflows
tools.detailed_description: A tool for designing and managing AiiDA workflows with an interactive GUI, supporting checkpoints, provenance tracking, and remote execution, making workflow creation more accessible.

tools.name: Cicero-Word-Generator
tools.one_line_profile: User interface and control software for atomic physics experiments
tools.detailed_description: A software suite designed for designing and running sequences on National Instruments digital and analog output cards, specifically tailored for atomic physics experiments.

tools.name: oculus_m750d
tools.one_line_profile: ROS wrapper for Oculus M750d Multibeam Echosounder
tools.detailed_description: A ROS (Robot Operating System) wrapper for the Oculus M750d Multibeam Echosounder, enabling the integration of this scientific sonar instrument into maritime robotics research platforms.

tools.name: webusbtmc
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based control for Test & Measurement instruments via USBTMC
tools.detailed_description: A tool enabling control of scientific test and measurement instruments directly from a web browser using the WebUSB API and USBTMC protocol, facilitating remote lab operations.

tools.name: pymechanical
tools.one_line_profile: Pythonic interface to Ansys Mechanical for simulation automation
tools.detailed_description: A Python client library for Ansys Mechanical, allowing researchers to automate mechanical simulations, script workflows, and integrate finite element analysis into larger scientific pipelines.

tools.name: gerber2ems
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to OpenEMS for PCB trace simulation from Gerber files
tools.detailed_description: A tool that converts Gerber files into OpenEMS scripts for electromagnetic simulation of PCB traces, featuring automatic grid generation and post-processing for electronics research.

tools.name: nDTomo
tools.one_line_profile: Suite for X-ray chemical imaging and tomography data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A software suite containing Python scripts and a GUI for the simulation, visualization, pre-processing, and analysis of X-ray chemical imaging and tomography data.

tools.name: HAL
tools.one_line_profile: Hardware Abstraction Layer library for robotics research
tools.detailed_description: A Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL) library developed by the Autonomous Robots and Perception Group, designed to standardize the interface between software and robotic hardware in research contexts.

tools.name: asreview-makita
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow generator for simulation studies in systematic reviews
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate workflows for simulation studies using ASReview LAB, enabling researchers to evaluate active learning models for systematic literature reviews.

tools.name: Coupling_ABAQUS_MATLAB
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Software-in-the-Loop coupling of Abaqus and MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A framework for running Finite Element packages (Abaqus) inside an online loop with MATLAB, enabling Software-in-the-Loop (SiL) simulations for structural design and control theory research.

tools.name: autolab
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for laboratory instrument control and automation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the control of laboratory instruments and the automation of scientific experiments, facilitating data acquisition and device management.

tools.name: flowchem
tools.one_line_profile: Application for controlling instruments in chemistry labs
tools.detailed_description: An application designed to simplify the control of instruments and devices commonly found in chemistry laboratories, particularly for flow chemistry automation.

tools.name: aiida-vibroscopy
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA package for automated infrared and Raman spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA package for automated calculation of vibrational properties, including infrared and Raman spectra and phonons, supporting various functionals.

tools.name: Beautiful Atoms
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for rendering atoms and molecules using Blender
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that leverages the Blender 3D creation suite to generate high-quality, artistic, and scientifically accurate visualizations of atomic structures and molecules, suitable for publications and presentations.

tools.name: easy-scpi
tools.one_line_profile: Library to control SCPI instruments for lab automation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to simplify the communication and control of scientific instruments that support the SCPI (Standard Commands for Programmable Instruments) protocol, facilitating laboratory automation and data acquisition.

tools.name: Bluesky
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment orchestration and data acquisition system
tools.detailed_description: A library for orchestrating experiments and data acquisition, originally developed at NSLS-II. It provides a high-level interface for controlling hardware, sequencing experiments, and collecting data in a structured way, widely used in synchrotrons and scientific laboratories.

tools.name: Ophyd
tools.one_line_profile: Hardware abstraction library for experiment control
tools.detailed_description: A hardware abstraction library that provides a consistent interface for controlling a wide variety of scientific hardware (motors, detectors, etc.) in Python. It is a core component of the Bluesky ecosystem, often used with EPICS.

tools.name: Ophyd-async
tools.one_line_profile: Asyncio-based hardware abstraction for Bluesky
tools.detailed_description: The next-generation hardware abstraction layer for the Bluesky ecosystem, built using Python's asyncio to provide asynchronous control of scientific hardware, improving performance and responsiveness in complex experimental setups.

tools.name: ChemoSpec
tools.one_line_profile: R functions for chemometric analysis of spectra
tools.detailed_description: A collection of R functions for the chemometric analysis of spectroscopic data (NMR, IR, Raman, etc.), including data processing, exploratory data analysis (PCA, HCA), and visualization.

tools.name: ClearML
tools.one_line_profile: MLOps platform for experiment management and orchestration
tools.detailed_description: An open-source MLOps platform widely used in AI for Science to automate, track, and orchestrate machine learning experiments. It provides experiment management, data versioning, and pipeline orchestration, essential for reproducible scientific AI research.

tools.name: bhusie
tools.one_line_profile: Black hole universal simulation interface engine
tools.detailed_description: A real-time black hole ray tracer and simulation engine. It allows for the visualization and simulation of light paths in the vicinity of black holes, useful for astrophysical education and research visualization.

tools.name: coretexpylib
tools.one_line_profile: Python client for Coretex experiment tracking and orchestration
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for programmatic interaction with the Coretex experiment tracking and orchestration server, facilitating the management of scientific machine learning experiments.

tools.name: Pycrafter6500
tools.one_line_profile: Controller for TI DLPLCR6500EVM DLP evaluation module
tools.detailed_description: A Python controller for the Texas Instruments DLPLCR6500EVM, enabling control of 'pattern on the fly' modes for DLP technology often used in optical experiments and lithography.

tools.name: octave-instrument-control
tools.one_line_profile: Instrument control package for GNU Octave
tools.detailed_description: Provides interfaces for GPIB, USBTMC, serial, TCP, VXI11, and VISA instrument control within the GNU Octave environment, enabling laboratory automation and data acquisition.

tools.name: deepmd-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package designed for generating many-body potential energy representations and performing molecular dynamics simulations with ab initio accuracy.

tools.name: dftd4
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic-charge dependent London dispersion correction
tools.detailed_description: A generally applicable atomic-charge dependent London dispersion correction tool for density functional theory (DFT) calculations.

tools.name: dora
tools.one_line_profile: Dataflow-Oriented Robotic Architecture middleware
tools.detailed_description: Middleware designed to streamline the creation of AI-based robotic applications, offering low latency, composable, and distributed dataflow capabilities.

tools.name: Uni-Lab-OS
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for Laboratory Automation
tools.detailed_description: An operating system/platform designed for managing and automating laboratory equipment and workflows.

tools.name: zenoh-plugin-ros2dds
tools.one_line_profile: Zenoh plugin for ROS2 DDS communication
tools.detailed_description: A plugin enabling Zenoh to interact with ROS2 systems using DDS, facilitating scalable and efficient communication for distributed robotics applications.

tools.name: bacting
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for chemo- and bioinformatics scripting
tools.detailed_description: An open-source platform for chemo- and bioinformatics that wraps common functionality and domain objects, providing a scriptable solution for life sciences data handling.

tools.name: aiida-defects
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for point defect calculations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that provides automated workflows for calculating properties of point defects in materials.

tools.name: neqsim-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for NeqSim fluid simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface to NeqSim, a library for calculating fluid behavior, phase equilibrium, and process simulation in thermodynamics.

tools.name: unreal_airsim
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation interface to Unreal Engine 4 via AirSim
tools.detailed_description: A simulation interface connecting ROS/robotics stacks to Unreal Engine 4 using the AirSim plugin, enabling high-fidelity robotics simulation.

tools.name: eve-parity
tools.one_line_profile: Formal verification tool for multi-agent systems
tools.detailed_description: Equilibrium Verification Environment (EVE) is a tool for the automated analysis and formal verification of temporal equilibrium properties in concurrent and multi-agent systems.

tools.name: aiida-orca
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for ORCA quantum chemistry package
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine to interface with the ORCA quantum chemistry software package, enabling automated electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: dagger
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment orchestration platform
tools.detailed_description: A tool for experiment orchestration, likely facilitating the management and reproducibility of scientific or machine learning experiments (from Facebook Research).

tools.name: flexiv_sim_plugin
tools.one_line_profile: Middleware plugin connecting Flexiv Elements Studio to external robot simulators
tools.detailed_description: A middleware plugin designed to bridge Flexiv Elements Studio with external simulation environments, supporting C++ and Python interfaces for robotic simulation workflows.

tools.name: roboflex
tools.one_line_profile: Performant robotics middleware with dynamic messaging
tools.detailed_description: A simple and performant robotics middleware that facilitates dynamic messaging over various transports, serving as a connector for robotic systems.

tools.name: BEMCom
tools.one_line_profile: Communication framework for Building Energy Management hardware abstraction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the rapid implementation of hardware abstraction layers (HAL) to communicate with diverse devices in building energy management systems, facilitating data collection and control.

tools.name: gz-physics
tools.one_line_profile: Abstract physics interface for robot simulation
tools.detailed_description: An abstract physics interface designed to support simulation and rapid development of robot applications, allowing switching between different physics engines.

tools.name: overreact
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for creating and analyzing chemical microkinetic models
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to create and analyze chemical microkinetic models built from computational chemistry data, automating the generation of rate equations.

tools.name: autogoal
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for program synthesis and Automated Machine Learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for program synthesis with a focus on Automated Machine Learning (AutoML), enabling the automatic discovery of machine learning pipelines.

tools.name: copper
tools.one_line_profile: Low-level hardware abstraction layers (HAL) for Python
tools.detailed_description: A module providing low-level hardware abstraction layers (HAL) as Python modules, facilitating hardware control and interaction in laboratory or robotics contexts.

tools.name: hal-intel
tools.one_line_profile: Low level Hardware Abstraction Layer for Intel hardware
tools.detailed_description: A module providing a low-level Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL) specifically for Intel hardware, enabling direct hardware interaction and control.

tools.name: ASE_ANI
tools.one_line_profile: ANI-1 neural net potential interface for ASE
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface connecting the ANI-1 neural network potential with the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE), enabling molecular dynamics simulations using ML potentials.

tools.name: PyQSTEM
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to the QSTEM electron microscopy simulation program
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the QSTEM electron microscopy simulation software, allowing for programmable setup, execution, and analysis of TEM/STEM simulations.

tools.name: vasp (jkitchin)
tools.one_line_profile: ASE-compliant Python interface for VASP materials simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the VASP (Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package) code, integrated with the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) to facilitate materials science modeling and workflow automation.

tools.name: panda_simulator
tools.one_line_profile: Gazebo simulator for Franka Emika Panda robot with ROS interface
tools.detailed_description: A simulation package for the Franka Emika Panda robot in Gazebo, providing ROS interfaces for controllers and state feedback, facilitating sim-to-real transfer for robotics research.

tools.name: hrtf-simulation
tools.one_line_profile: WebGL interface for exploring the CIPIC HRTF database
tools.detailed_description: A visualization and auralization tool for the CIPIC Head-Related Transfer Function (HRTF) database, allowing researchers to simulate and listen to spatial audio properties.

tools.name: rust-soapysdr
tools.one_line_profile: Rust bindings for SoapySDR hardware abstraction layer
tools.detailed_description: Rust interface for SoapySDR, a vendor-neutral hardware abstraction layer for Software Defined Radio (SDR), used in radio astronomy and signal processing experiments.

tools.name: aimsgb
tools.one_line_profile: Ab-initio Interface Materials Simulation Project for Grain Boundaries
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating atomic coordinates of grain boundaries in materials, facilitating ab-initio simulations and interface modeling.

tools.name: labscript-suite
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment control and automation system for quantum optics
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for experiment control, automation, and data management, widely used in quantum optics and cold atom physics laboratories.

tools.name: vrep_ros_bridge
tools.one_line_profile: Interface between V-REP simulation and ROS
tools.detailed_description: A plugin providing a communication interface between the V-REP (CoppeliaSim) robotics simulator and ROS, enabling external control of simulations via ROS messages.

tools.name: ase_exploration
tools.one_line_profile: Robotic exploration planning based on forward simulation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for autonomous robotic exploration that utilizes forward simulation to plan paths and actions in unknown environments.

tools.name: AeroPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for XFOIL aerodynamics simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that wraps XFOIL, allowing for iterative aerodynamic simulations and airfoil analysis directly from Python scripts.

tools.name: BlueSkyFlightControl
tools.one_line_profile: Open source flight control stack for multi-rotor UAVs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive open-source flight control software for multi-rotor unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), serving as a platform for robotics and control theory research.

tools.name: aiida-lsmo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA workflows for LSMO laboratory materials research
tools.detailed_description: A collection of AiiDA workflows developed by the LSMO laboratory at EPFL for automating materials science simulations and data provenance.

tools.name: aiida-raspa
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for RASPA molecular simulation code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with RASPA, a software for simulating adsorption and diffusion of molecules in flexible nanoporous materials.

tools.name: aiida-zeopp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Zeo++ porous materials analysis
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with Zeo++, a software package for performing geometry-based analysis of porous materials.

tools.name: machinekit-hal
tools.one_line_profile: Universal framework for machine control and robotics
tools.detailed_description: A hardware abstraction layer and framework for machine control, widely used in robotics and CNC research for real-time control and hardware interfacing.

tools.name: Go2Py
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface and simulation environment for Unitree Go2 robot
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface and simulation environment designed for the Unitree Go2 quadruped robot, facilitating research in legged robotics and control.

tools.name: AiiDA Explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based provenance browser for the AiiDA materials science workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool that allows users to explore AiiDA databases through an interactive provenance browser, facilitating the analysis of materials science computational workflows and data lineage.

tools.name: FireWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management system for high-throughput computing
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management system designed for running high-throughput calculations at supercomputing centers. It is a core component of the Materials Project infrastructure for managing complex scientific workflows.

tools.name: MPmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for analyzing ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) simulations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations using VASP. It integrates with the Materials Project ecosystem (pymatgen, custodian, fireworks) for handling MD data.

tools.name: Contrast
tools.one_line_profile: Data acquisition and orchestration framework for beamline experiments
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight data acquisition framework designed for orchestrating experiments at synchrotron beamlines, handling motor control, detector readout, and scan sequencing.

tools.name: Photonmover
tools.one_line_profile: Instrument control framework for optics and photonics labs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for controlling scientific instruments used in optics, photonics, and electronics laboratories, facilitating automated data acquisition and experiment orchestration.

tools.name: AiiDA-AutoCAS
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automated active space selection in quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that automates the selection of active spaces for multireference calculations, streamlining complex quantum chemistry workflows.

tools.name: AiiDA Dynamic Workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Plugin for defining dynamic AiiDA workflows using Python functions
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that allows users to define workflows dynamically using standard Python functions, enhancing the flexibility of scientific workflow construction.

tools.name: AiiDA-PySCF
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the PySCF quantum chemistry framework
tools.detailed_description: An interface connecting the AiiDA workflow engine with the PySCF (Python-based Simulations of Chemistry Framework) code, enabling automated quantum chemistry simulations.

tools.name: ether_ros
tools.one_line_profile: Middleware bridging EtherCAT and ROS for real-time control
tools.detailed_description: A middleware program that interconnects the EtherLab Master Module API (EtherCAT) with the ROS environment, enabling real-time control of hardware in robotics and lab automation contexts.

tools.name: DeepPhysX
tools.one_line_profile: Framework interfacing AI with numerical physics simulation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for interfacing deep learning models with numerical simulations (specifically the SOFA framework), enabling AI-augmented physics simulations for medical and engineering applications.

tools.name: NICOS
tools.one_line_profile: Networked Instrument Control System for neutron scattering
tools.detailed_description: A control system designed for operating neutron scattering instruments, handling hardware communication, experiment sequencing, and data recording.

tools.name: PyFMI
tools.one_line_profile: Library for interacting with Functional Mock-Up Units (FMUs)
tools.detailed_description: A package for loading and interacting with Functional Mock-Up Units (FMUs), which are compiled dynamic models compliant with the Functional Mock-Up Interface (FMI) standard, used for model exchange and co-simulation in physics and engineering.

tools.name: Wrapyfi
tools.one_line_profile: Middleware connecting robotics frameworks with deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A middleware wrapper that integrates robotics messaging systems (ROS, YARP, ZeroMQ) with deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow), facilitating the deployment of AI models on robotic platforms.

tools.name: AiiDA-Gaussian
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Gaussian quantum chemistry software
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that interfaces with the Gaussian quantum chemistry software, enabling the automation and management of Gaussian calculations within AiiDA workflows.

tools.name: AiiDAlab Empa Surfaces
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab application for on-surface chemistry simulations
tools.detailed_description: An application for the AiiDAlab platform tailored for on-surface chemistry research, providing a user-friendly interface to run and analyze relevant simulations.

tools.name: Mole
tools.one_line_profile: Testing and experimentation tool for robots and autonomous systems
tools.detailed_description: Mole is a utility designed to assist with the testing and experimentation phases involving robots and autonomous systems, likely providing interfaces or harnesses for running experiments.

tools.name: ASE
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial skill embeddings for physically simulated characters
tools.detailed_description: A framework for training reusable controllers for physically simulated characters using adversarial skill embeddings, applicable in robotics and physics-based animation research.

tools.name: irl
tools.one_line_profile: Robotics control code for ST-R17 and UR5 robots
tools.detailed_description: Codebase for the Interactive Robotics Laboratory (Olin College) supporting ST-R17 and UR5 robot arms, providing control interfaces for robotics research.

tools.name: Edalize
tools.one_line_profile: Abstraction library for interfacing EDA tools
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a unified interface for various Electronic Design Automation (EDA) tools, facilitating hardware simulation and synthesis workflows.

tools.name: jds6600_python
tools.one_line_profile: Python library to remote-control JDS6600 signal generator
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for remote controlling Junce-Instruments JDS6600 signal generators via USB, enabling automated signal generation for lab experiments.

tools.name: OpSim
tools.one_line_profile: Open source Chemical Engineering Process Simulator
tools.detailed_description: A Chemical Engineering Process Simulator featuring a drag-and-drop GUI and a high-performance simulation engine for modeling chemical processes.

tools.name: SubT Virtual
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation assets and interfaces for DARPA SubT Challenge
tools.detailed_description: Software for the virtual track of the DARPA SubT Challenge, including Gazebo simulation assets and ROS interfaces for simulating underground robot operations.

tools.name: widget-bandsplot
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget to plot bandstructure and density of states
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter widget designed for visualizing electronic band structures and density of states (DOS) in computational materials science.

tools.name: slave
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight python package for instrument control
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to simplify the control of laboratory instruments, providing a lightweight interface for automation.

tools.name: stonefish_ros
tools.one_line_profile: ROS interface for the Stonefish marine robotics simulator
tools.detailed_description: A ROS package implementing an interface for the Stonefish library, enabling simulation of marine robots within the ROS ecosystem.

tools.name: pcdsdevices
tools.one_line_profile: Ophyd device subclasses for LCLS PCDS
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Ophyd device subclasses specifically designed for the Photon Controls and Data Systems (PCDS) at LCLS, enabling hardware abstraction and control.

tools.name: Typhos
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic GUI generation for Ophyd Devices
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatic yet customizable Graphical User Interface generation for Ophyd devices, facilitating the creation of control screens for scientific instruments.

tools.name: prpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python utilities for Personal Robotics Laboratory
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python utilities and libraries used by the Personal Robotics Laboratory for robot control, planning, and manipulation tasks.

tools.name: lammps_interface
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic generation of LAMMPS input files for MOFs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatically generating LAMMPS input files for molecular dynamics simulations of Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs) and other porous materials.

tools.name: AROS
tools.one_line_profile: Open Automated Robotic System for Biological Laboratories
tools.detailed_description: An open-source automated robotic system designed for biological laboratories to facilitate high-throughput screening and sample handling.

tools.name: phosphobot
tools.one_line_profile: Middleware for controlling AI robots
tools.detailed_description: Community-driven UI middleware for controlling robots, recording datasets, and training action models, compatible with SO-100 and SO-101 robotic arms.

tools.name: pysimm
tools.one_line_profile: Python simulation interface for molecular modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate the setup and execution of molecular simulations, interfacing with LAMMPS and other simulation engines.

tools.name: VMAS
tools.one_line_profile: Vectorized Multi-Agent Simulator for RL benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A vectorized differentiable simulator designed for efficient Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning (MARL) benchmarking, featuring a 2D physics engine.

tools.name: pyiron
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated development environment for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: An integrated development environment (IDE) for computational materials science that manages complex simulation workflows and data.

tools.name: python-usbtmc
tools.one_line_profile: USBTMC driver for controlling instruments over USB
tools.detailed_description: A Python driver for controlling laboratory instruments that support the USBTMC (USB Test and Measurement Class) protocol.

tools.name: python-vxi11
tools.one_line_profile: VXI-11 driver for controlling instruments over Ethernet
tools.detailed_description: A Python driver for controlling laboratory instruments over Ethernet using the VXI-11 protocol.

tools.name: PyVISA
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for VISA library to control measurement devices
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that enables control of measurement devices and test equipment via GPIB, RS232, USB, or Ethernet using the VISA standard.

tools.name: OpenFermion-Psi4
tools.one_line_profile: Plugin interfacing OpenFermion with the Psi4 electronic structure package
tools.detailed_description: A plugin library that enables the use of the Psi4 electronic structure package within the OpenFermion framework. It allows researchers to perform quantum chemistry simulations and generate molecular Hamiltonians for quantum computing applications using Psi4's capabilities.

tools.name: OpenFermion-PySCF
tools.one_line_profile: Plugin interfacing OpenFermion with the PySCF electronic structure package
tools.detailed_description: A plugin library that interfaces the OpenFermion framework with the PySCF electronic structure package. It facilitates the generation of molecular integrals and Hamiltonians from PySCF calculations for use in quantum algorithm development and simulation.

tools.name: Meadow
tools.one_line_profile: Publish/request middleware for robotics applications
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight middleware designed for robotics applications, focusing on ease of use for publish/request communication patterns. It serves as a connector in robotic control systems, facilitating data exchange between components.

tools.name: QHAL
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum Hardware Abstraction Layer
tools.detailed_description: A Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL) for quantum computing hardware, developed to provide a unified interface for interacting with various quantum devices. It serves as a connector between high-level quantum software and physical quantum processors.

tools.name: rm_control
tools.one_line_profile: Hardware/simulation interface for RoboMaster and high-performance robots
tools.detailed_description: A control interface based on ros-controls, designed for developing RoboMaster robots and other high-performance robotic systems. It provides the necessary connectors to bridge algorithms with robot hardware or simulators.

tools.name: blocktest
tools.one_line_profile: Test system for generic robot middlewares
tools.detailed_description: A testing framework designed for evaluating and validating generic robot middlewares. It aids in the development and maintenance of robust robotics infrastructure by ensuring middleware components function correctly.

tools.name: YARP
tools.one_line_profile: Yet Another Robot Platform - Middleware for robotics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive middleware platform for robotics, facilitating modular software development and hardware interfacing. It is widely used in research for connecting sensors, actuators, and processors in complex robotic systems.

tools.name: yarp-devices-ros2
tools.one_line_profile: Interoperation layer between YARP and ROS2
tools.detailed_description: A collection of plugins, devices, and network wrappers that enable seamless communication and interoperability between the YARP and ROS2 robotics middlewares. It acts as a bridge connector for integrating systems using different standards.

tools.name: mc_mujoco
tools.one_line_profile: MuJoCo physics engine interface for mc-rtc controller
tools.detailed_description: An interface that connects the MuJoCo physics simulator with the mc-rtc robotics control framework. It allows researchers to simulate and test robot controllers developed in mc-rtc within the high-fidelity MuJoCo environment.

tools.name: simulation_interfaces
tools.one_line_profile: Standard interfaces for interacting with simulators from ROS 2
tools.detailed_description: A set of standard interface definitions and messages for controlling and interacting with various simulators within the ROS 2 ecosystem. It standardizes the connector layer between robotics software and simulation backends.

tools.name: Forest
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of HLS FPGA Modules with ROS2 Systems
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automated integration of High-Level Synthesis (HLS) FPGA modules into ROS2 robotic systems. It facilitates the use of hardware acceleration in robotics research by bridging FPGA logic with the ROS2 communication layer.

tools.name: SOIE
tools.one_line_profile: Self-organization Interactive Evolution simulation interface
tools.detailed_description: A simulation interface designed for the interactive exploration of self-organizing particle systems. It enables researchers to simulate, visualize, and interact with complex emergent behaviors in particle-based models.

tools.name: Firewheel
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment orchestration tool for distributed network systems
tools.detailed_description: An experiment orchestration tool developed by Sandia National Laboratories for building, controlling, and repeating experiments on distributed network systems at scale. It supports scientific research in network dynamics and cybersecurity.

tools.name: sbi
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for simulation-based inference
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for simulation-based inference (SBI), enabling researchers to perform Bayesian inference on complex scientific models where the likelihood is intractable. It supports various neural inference methods to estimate posterior distributions from simulation data.

tools.name: SIFT
tools.one_line_profile: Source Information Flow Toolbox for electrophysiological data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB-compatible toolbox for the analysis and visualization of multivariate causality and information flow in electrophysiological data (EEG/ECoG/MEG). It provides modules for data preprocessing, model fitting, connectivity estimation, and statistical analysis of neuronal data.

tools.name: AiiDA-Siesta
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the Siesta DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the Siesta Density Functional Theory (DFT) code. It enables the automation of material science calculations, managing inputs, outputs, and workflows for electronic structure simulations.

tools.name: Self-Driving Lab Demo
tools.one_line_profile: Software for autonomous experimentation and self-driving labs
tools.detailed_description: A software package and demonstration for setting up a self-driving lab (autonomous experimentation system). It integrates hardware control (LEDs, spectrophotometers) with adaptive design algorithms to automate scientific discovery and optimization loops.

tools.name: aiida-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIP)
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that interfaces with Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials, enabling automated high-throughput atomistic simulations using ML models for materials science.

tools.name: plmctrl
tools.one_line_profile: Control library for Texas Instruments Phase-only Light Modulators
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for controlling DLP6750 EVM Phase-only Light Modulators (PLM) via video interface, designed for structured light and optics experiments in laboratory settings.

tools.name: apriltag
tools.one_line_profile: Visual fiducial system for robotics localization
tools.detailed_description: Extensions to the APRIL Robotics Laboratory AprilTag software, providing robust visual marker detection for robot localization and augmented reality, widely used in robotics research labs.

tools.name: cocotb-vivado
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Xilinx Vivado simulator via cocotb
tools.detailed_description: A connector allowing Python-based verification frameworks (cocotb) to drive Xilinx Vivado hardware simulations, facilitating automated testing and verification of experimental hardware logic.

tools.name: turbo-ros-pkg
tools.one_line_profile: ROS packages from TU Berlin Robotics & Biology Laboratory
tools.detailed_description: A collection of ROS (Robot Operating System) packages developed by the Robotics & Biology Laboratory at TU Berlin, providing drivers and algorithms for bio-inspired robotics research.

tools.name: CLS-CAD
tools.one_line_profile: Automated CAD assembly generation using Combinatory Logic Synthesis
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automated generation of CAD assemblies based on Combinatory Logic Synthesis (CLS), applying mathematical logic to mechanical design automation and synthesis.

tools.name: labbench
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools for laboratory automation
tools.detailed_description: A suite of Python scripting tools designed by NIST to streamline laboratory automation tasks, including instrument control and data collection workflows.

tools.name: k-wave-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for k-Wave acoustic simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the k-Wave toolbox, enabling GPU-accelerated time-domain simulation of acoustic wave fields for medical imaging and physics research.

tools.name: OpenMMDL
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive setup and workflow management for OpenMM molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A graphical interface and Python workflow tool designed to simplify the preparation and execution of molecular dynamics simulations for protein-ligand complexes using the OpenMM engine. It assists in cleaning PDB files, assigning force fields, and configuring simulation parameters.

tools.name: aiida-yambo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Yambo many-body perturbation theory code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the Yambo code. It automates Many-Body Perturbation Theory (MBPT) calculations, managing inputs, outputs, and provenance for materials science simulations.

tools.name: Instrumentino
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical user interface framework for controlling Arduino-based laboratory instruments
tools.detailed_description: An open-source modular GUI framework designed to control Arduino-based experimental setups. It allows researchers to define measurement sequences, control hardware parameters, and acquire data without extensive programming.

tools.name: aiida-castep
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CASTEP DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the CASTEP code. It enables the automation of Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations, managing the submission, retrieval, and parsing of results for materials science research.
